page.title: 08Local fetes
page.content: Each summer,fetes are held in most of the local villages in the area.They are based on the idea of the traditional medieval village fair.They include many stalls selling locally made produce as well as sideshows, games,competitions,fancy dress,food and drink stands,promotional enterprises,livestock shows etc. They have both a economical and social value as meeting places and market centres.They are held on separate weekends,often at a school or church, to avoid clashing with a neighbouring fete.
